name: Indigo Image
description:
Indigo image is a full service Chicago web design and front end development company . We have 18+ years experience in creating websites, graphic design and SEO (search engine optimization). We are your creative partner. Our affordable, professional solutions make us an easy choice for small to medium sized businesses, demanding top quality work. Our approach combines the following elements: Collaboration Working closely with our clients is the key to our success.
By understanding your business we can better assist through tailored design solutions Professionalism Our clients are in business because they meet the needs of their customers, day after day. They deserve the same level of professionalism and commitment from their suppliers and that includes us. We specialize in smaller commissions - no job is too small to expect quality and service. Painless Hiring a graphic or web designer can be a task that many small companies and organizations put off - they may be concerned about costs, unfamiliar with the technology or unsure how to specify what they want. Whatever the project, our goal is to make the process as simple as possible.
